description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国职业外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部常务副部长（正部长级）。
description.en: A career diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Executive Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China (minister level).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长、外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of Foreign Affairs and former Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国常驻联合国代表、特命全权大使的职务，为中华人民共和国常驻联合国代表团的最高级别的外交官。
description.en: The position of Permanent Representative of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary, is the highest-ranking diplomat in the Permanent Mission of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，曾任中国常驻联合国代表。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, former Permanent Representative of China to the United Nations.

description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, former Permanent Representative of China to the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，曾任中国常驻联合国日内瓦办事处和瑞士其他国际组织代表。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, former Permanent Representative of China to the United Nations Office at Geneva and other International Organizations in Switzerland.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国常驻联合国日内瓦办事处和瑞士其他国际组织代表。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Permanent Representative of China to the United Nations Office at Geneva and other International Organizations in Switzerland.

description.zh-cn: 2024年5月30日，马朝旭在华盛顿会见美国副国务卿库尔特·坎贝尔。
description.en: On May 30, 2024, Ma Zhaoxu met with U.S. Deputy Secretary of State Kurt Campbell in Washington.

description.zh-cn: 马朝旭接替乐玉成出任中华人民共和国外交部常务副部长。
description.en: Ma Zhaoxu succeeded Le Yucheng as the Executive Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 马朝旭接替刘结一担任中国常驻联合国代表。
description.en: Ma Zhaoxu succeeded Liu Jieyi as the Permanent Representative of China to the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 张军接替马朝旭担任中国常驻联合国代表。
description.en: Zhang Jun succeeded Ma Zhaoxu as the Permanent Representative of China to the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 马朝旭接替陈育明任中华人民共和国驻澳大利亚大使。
description.en: Ma Zhaoxu succeeded Chen Yuming as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Australia.

description.zh-cn: 成竞业接替马朝旭任中华人民共和国驻澳大利亚大使。
description.en: Cheng Jingye succeeded Ma Zhaoxu as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Australia.

description.zh-cn: 马朝旭接替吴海龙，任常驻联合国日内瓦办事处和瑞士其他国际组织代表。
description.en: Ma Zhaoxu succeeded Wu Hailong as the Permanent Representative to the United Nations Office at Geneva and other International Organizations in Switzerland.

description.zh-cn: 俞建华接替马朝旭，任常驻联合国日内瓦办事处和瑞士其他国际组织代表。
description.en: Yu Jianhua succeeded Ma Zhaoxu as the Permanent Representative to the United Nations Office at Geneva and other International Organizations in Switzerland.

description.zh-cn: 马朝旭接替刘建超担任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Ma Zhaoxu succeeded Liu Jianchao as the Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 秦刚接替马朝旭出任外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Qin Gang succeeded Ma Zhaoxu as Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中华人民共和国外交部副部长及常务副部长期间，于王毅任外交部长时为其下属。
description.en: During his tenure as Vice Minister and Executive Vice Minister of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, he was a subordinate of Wang Yi when Wang was the Foreign Minister.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中华人民共和国外交部副部长及常务副部长期间，于秦刚任外交部长时为其下属。
description.en: During his tenure as Vice Minister and Executive Vice Minister of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, he was a subordinate of Qin Gang when Qin was the Foreign Minister.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡广播局于1986年发起首届亚洲大专辩论会。
description.en: The Singapore Broadcasting Corporation initiated the first Asian Inter-Varsity Debating Championship in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 马朝旭参加1986年首届亚洲大专辩论会，并获得“全场最佳辩手”称号，因此闻名。
description.en: Ma Zhaoxu participated in the first Asian Inter-Varsity Debating Championship in 1986 and won the 'Best Debater' award, which brought him fame.
